n=int(input())
l=list(input())
j=0
count=0
while(j<len(l)-1):
	if(l[j]==l[j+1]):
		j-=1
		count+=1
		l.pop(j+1)
	j+=1
print(count)

# cook your dish here

n=int(input())
st=str(input())
count=0
while(len(st)>0):
    h=0
    if "RR" in st:
        i=st.index("RR")
        st=st[:i] +st[i+1:]
        count+=1
        h=1
    if "GG" in st:
        i=st.index("GG")
        st=st[:i] +st[i+1:]
        h=1
        count+=1
    if "BB" in st:
        i=st.index("BB")
        st=st[:i] +st[i+1:]
        h=1
        count+=1
    if h==0:
        break
print(count)

# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
s=list(str(input()))
i=0
ans=0
while i<len(s)-1:
    if s[i]==s[i+1]:
        del s[i+1]
        ans+=1
    else:
        i+=1
print(ans)
